title: User Sign Up with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up with valid email and password, and that their profile is created with default settings.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page
Enter a valid email and a strong password
Submit the sign-up form
Verify that the user is redirected to the dashboard page
Check that a new profile is created in the database with default settings

title: Sign In with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user can sign in successfully using valid credentials and access their personalized dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page
Input valid registered email and password
Click the sign-in button
Verify the user lands on their personalized dashboard with widgets
Verify that the session is active and persisted for subsequent requests

title: Sign In with Incorrect Password
description: Verify that signing in with an incorrect password results in a meaningful error and no access to user data.

steps.description: Go to the sign-in page
Enter valid email but incorrect password
Click sign-in
Check that a clear invalid credentials message is displayed
Verify user is not granted access to dashboard or data

title: Dashboard Weather Widget Displays Accurate Data
description: Verify that the Dashboard weather widget shows accurate, up-to-date weather information retrieved from the Open-Meteo API based on user location.

steps.description: Sign in and navigate to the dashboard
Confirm that the weather widget loads with current weather data
Verify weather information corresponds to Open-Meteo data for the user's location
Check that the widget refreshes weather data on manual refresh or on schedule

title: Task Manager - Create, Update, and Drag-and-Drop Tasks
description: Verify that users can create new tasks, set priorities and due dates, update task details, and reorder tasks via drag-and-drop functionality on the Kanban board with persistence.

steps.description: Go to the Task Manager page
Create a new task with title, description, priority and due date
Verify that the new task appears in the correct column on the Kanban board
Edit the task to update priority and due date
Verify the task updates are reflected immediately
Drag the task to a different column on the Kanban board
Confirm the task is moved visually and state updates on the backend
Reload the page
Confirm the task and its updated state persist after reload

title: Calendar Module - Event Creation and Multi-View Navigation
description: Verify that users can create calendar events, view and navigate between month, week, and day views and that events persist correctly with accurate details.

steps.description: Navigate to the calendar page
Switch between month, week, and day views
Validate that calendar view updates correspondingly with correct layout
Create a new event with title, time, date, and optional description
Verify the event appears on the correct date and time slot in all views
Access the event history widget and validate the created event is listed
Confirm that the event data matches creation inputs
Reload the calendar page
Verify that events persist and are displayed correctly after reload

title: Finance Tracker - Add Income and Expenses, Validate Cashflow and Budget
description: Verify input of various income and expense entries updates cashflow and budget calculations correctly, and data persists with accurate summaries.

steps.description: Navigate to the Finance Tracker page
Add a new income entry with category, amount, and date
Verify income appears in the income list and total income updates accordingly
Add an expense with category, amount, and date
Confirm expenses list updates and total expenses reflect the new entry
Verify cashflow calculation equals income minus expenses
Set or update budget limits for a category
Check budget usage visualization updates to reflect current spend relative to budget
Reload the page
Confirm all financial data and calculations persist after reload

title: AI Copilot - Chat Interaction and Function Calls
description: Verify that the AI Copilot assistant responds correctly to user queries, streams responses, executes function calls such as createTask and scheduleEvent, and integrates with retrieval-augmented generation.

steps.description: Open the AI Copilot chat interface
Send a command to create a new task with details
Verify the AI streams a response acknowledging the task creation
Verify the task is actually created and listed in the Task Manager
Send a request to schedule a calendar event
Confirm AI response streams and event is created in calendar
Ask AI for budgeting analysis
Verify the AI returns a relevant budget analysis summary based on user data
Request a news summarization
Check the AI returns a coherent news summary using RAG integration

title: Notification System - Real-time Delivery and Management
description: Verify that notifications for tasks, events, and system updates are delivered in real-time, are displayed in the notification sidebar, and can be marked as read or responded to properly.

steps.description: Trigger a notification such as a task due alert or event reminder
Verify the notification appears immediately in the notification sidebar
Open the notification sidebar
Mark one or more notifications as read
Check that the notification count decrements and UI updates accordingly
Respond to actionable notifications if applicable
Verify that actions are correctly handled and notification removed or updated

title: Responsive Layout and Theme Toggle Functionality
description: Verify that the application layout adapts correctly on various device screen sizes and that theme toggling between light and dark modes works consistently across all components.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop browser
Verify that layout displays full sidebar, topbar and widgets as designed
Resize the browser to tablet and mobile widths
Verify the bottom navigation bar and hamburger menu appear appropriately on smaller devices
Toggle the theme switcher to dark mode
Verify UI colors update to dark theme consistently across pages and components
Toggle back to light mode
Verify UI reverts to light theme correctly

title: External API Integration - News and Stocks Data Display
description: Verify that news and stock data retrieved via GNews and Alpha Vantage APIs display correctly and refresh regularly on the Dashboard widgets.

steps.description: Open the Dashboard page with news and stocks widgets
Verify the news headlines and brief summaries load from GNews API
Verify that stock quotes and charts display with Alpha Vantage data
Manually refresh or wait for auto refresh interval
Confirm that fresh data is loaded and displayed without errors

title: Profile Management - Update Avatar and Account Details
description: Verify users can update their profile information including avatar image upload, name, and preferences, with changes saved and reflected in the UI.

steps.description: Navigate to account settings page
Upload a new avatar image
Verify the new avatar is displayed immediately and saved in user profile
Update account details such as display name and email preferences
Verify changes are saved successfully and reflect on user profile UI

title: Security - Ensure Row Level Security (RLS) Enforces Data Isolation
description: Verify that users can only access their own data and cannot query or modify data owned by other users due to implementation of RLS policies on the database schema.

steps.description: Login as User A and attempt to access User B's task or event via direct API or UI manipulation
Verify access is denied or data is not returned
Try SQL queries or API calls that bypass UI to retrieve or update other users' data
Confirm RLS prevents unauthorized data access or mutation

title: Screen Time Tracking - Data Accuracy and API Response
description: Verify that the screen time tracking API accurately records user activity periods and that the screentime widget displays this data correctly on the dashboard.

steps.description: Sign in and use the application for a measured period
Verify that the screentime widget displays activity data matching the usage period
Call the screen time tracking API directly
Confirm the API returns accurate and properly formatted screen time data

title: Help & Contact Support - Submit Contact Form Successfully
description: Verify that users can fill in and submit the contact form on the Help page and receive confirmation that their request was sent successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the Help & Contact page
Fill in required fields with valid inputs in the contact form
Submit the contact form
Verify successful submission message appears
Check that the backend API processes and stores the contact message
